tool.name: aurora_freebayes
tool.description: Bayesian haplotype-based genetic polymorphism discovery and genotyping.
tool.command:
######### each aurora tool generates a html file and have an files path directory associated with it. mkdir -p $report.files_path &&
######### three important paths: ######### 1. path to tool installation directory ######### 2. path to report html ######### 3. path to files_path directory associated with the report output. export TOOL_INSTALL_DIR='${__tool_directory__}' && export REPORT='$report' && export REPORT_FILES_PATH='$report.files_path' &&
############ create a hidden file to store r markdown rendering log touch $report.files_path/r_rendering.log.txt &&
############ finally run the render.R script Rscript '${__tool_directory__}/rmarkdown_report_render.R'
-o $report -d $report.files_path
-f '$input.reference_genome' -b '$input.bam_file' -s '$input.samples_file' -t '$input.targets_file' -r '$input.region'
-T '$population_model.theta' -p '$population_model.ploidy'
-v '$vcf_file'

param.name: reference_genome
param.label: Reference Genome
param.help: Use FILE as the reference sequence for analysis. An index file (FILE.fai) will be created if none exists. If neither --targets nor --region are specified, FreeBayes will analyze every position in this reference.

param.name: samples_file
param.label: Samples file
param.help: Limit analysis to samples listed (one per line) in the FILE. By default FreeBayes will analyze all samples in its input BAM files.

param.name: targets_file
param.label: Targets file
param.help: Limit analysis to targets listed in the BED-format FILE.

param.name: region
param.label: Region (<chrom>:<start_position>-<end_position>)
param.help: Limit analysis to the specified region, 0-base coordinates, end_position not included (same as BED format). Either '-' or '..' maybe used as a separator.

param.name: theta
param.label: Theta
param.help: The expected mutation rate or pairwise nucleotide diversity among the population under analysis. This serves as the single parameter to the Ewens Sampling Formula prior model default: 0.001

param.name: ploidy
param.label: Ploidy
param.help: Sets the default ploidy for the analysis to N. default: 2
